definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: Do the walk-it-out dance with guidance from a choreographer in this free video on dance lessons.
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈課上做從編舞指導步行它出在這個自由舞蹈視頻。

sentences.english: And lead dancer for this version was Sarah Regner who is perfectly suited adventure choreography.
sentences.chinese: 這個視頻裏領舞是薩拉，她是非常合適的一個編舞。

sentences.english: Learn some Latin dance lunges from a choreographer in this free video.
sentences.chinese: 學習一些拉丁舞弓步在這個自由影片編舞。

sentences.english: The dance motive not only is a beginning which choreographs a dance, is the work essence.
sentences.chinese: 舞蹈動機不僅是編舞的起點，更是作品的內核。

sentences.english: Get tips for doing the air walk move in this video clip from professional hip hop dance choreographer.
sentences.chinese: 找這樣的空氣走在影片剪輯專業街舞編舞移動技巧。

definition: to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
part (in multi-part instrumental or choral music), such as the soprano part or bass part
type of opera from Taiwan and Fujian
